fields.title: Support multiple Gitblit instances on a single OpenShift application server
fields.body: Currently, Gitblit assumes it is running a single-instance environment.  There are some users who may want to serve multiple Gitblit instances with a single application server hosted on RedHat's OpenShift PaaS.  This requires flexibility in configuring the *baseFolder* which is currently hard-coded to detect and use OPENSHIFT_DATA_DIR.
